recipesJson.name: John Cena
recipesJson.author: Chrisdvr1
recipesJson.description:
So why is this recipe called John Cena.... Well you can't mix me üòÅüòÅüòÅ at least not yet.

Wonderful strawberry citrus Mimosa with the perception of effervescence, and a great sweet and bitter contrast. These new FLV flavorings are going to be game changers. If you want to hear some flavor notes me kopal and concrete will be on mix life tonight at 8 Pacific time. 

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCi-1CgoitSnlqAJEAzJWXuQ 

Edit: the show is cancelled this week ‚òπÔ∏è I guess we'll just have to build the anticipation make sure to tune in next week
